info.title: SIM Management
info.description: Documentation of the 1NCE API for SIM Management.

get.description: Get a List of SIMs for the current account.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Number index of the requested SIM list page. Use this parameter to iterate through all SIMs on the different pages. The total amount of pages is listed in the response header.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Defines the size of a page, the number of individual SIMs listed on one page. The maximum allowed value is 100.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description:
Filter parameter in {filter}:{value} format. Expects comma separated list of filtering criteria out of the following fields:
  • imei
  • ip_address

Example: "ip_address:127.0.0.1,imei:4711"

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Sort values in a comma seperated list. Prepend "-" for descending sort. Possible values:
  • imei
  • ip_address

Example:"ip_address,-imei"

items.title: SIM Card

iccid_with_luhn.description: ICCID identifier of the SIM with Luhn check number.

imsi.description: First IMSI of the SIM, used for normal 1NCE network.

imsi_2.description: Second IMSI of the SIM, used for China+ network.

current_imsi.description: Currently active IMSI, dependent on the region where the SIM is used.

imei.description: IMEI of the device in which the SIM is inserted.

imei_lock.description: Indicates if SIM is locked to the current device IMEI.

status.description: The current status of the SIM card.

activation_date.description: The date when the SIM card was activated.

ip_address.description: The fixed IP address of the SIM card.

current_quota.description: The overall set data quota for the SIM in MB.

quota_status.title: Quota Status

id.description:
Numeric indicator for the threshold levels:
  • 0: more than 20%
  • 1: less than 20%
  • 2: 0% remaining

description.description: Text description of the quota status.

threshold_reached_date.description: Date on which the threshold less than 20% of the quota avaliable was reached.

quota_exceeded_date.description: Date on which 100% of the avaliable quota was exceeded.

quota_status.description: Indicates whether more than 20%, less than 20% or 0% of the current quota SMS or data are still available.

current_quota_SMS.description: Current SMS Quota for the SIM.

quota_status_SMS.title: Quota Status

id.description:
Numeric indicator for the threshold levels:
  • 0: more than 20%
  • 1: less than 20%
  • 2: 0% remaining

description.description: Text description of the quota status.

threshold_reached_date.description: Date on which the threshold less than 20% of the quota avaliable was reached.

quota_exceeded_date.description: Date on which 100% of the avaliable quota was exceeded.

quota_status_SMS.description: Indicates whether more than 20%, less than 20% or 0% of the current quota SMS or data are still available.

label.description: Label set by the customer in the 1NCE Portal for the SIM.

items.description: Detailed information about a SIM card.

post.description: Change a list of SIMS for activate, deactivate, label, IMEI lock, etc. The actual change will be done asynchronously. A positive-response only means that the SIM changes has been successfully placed into the queue.

requestBody.description: A list of SIM parameters where some parameters should be changed.

items.title: SIM Update Values

label.description: Label of the SIM set by the customer in the 1NCE Portal.

imei_lock.description: Flag that indicates if SIM is locked to the current device IMEI.

status.description: Status of the SIM. A SIM can be enabled (active) or disabled (deactivated).

items.description: Information about a SIM card based on a SIM update procedure.

get.description: Get detail information (status, label, MSISDN, IMSI, ICCID, Lifetime, etc.) for a singe SIM based on the ICCID.

parameters.name: iccid
parameters.description: The ICCID of the SIM to be queried.

put.description: Modification of a SIM card to activate, deactivate, change label, change IMEI lock, etc.

parameters.name: iccid
parameters.description: The ICCID of the SIM to be changed.

requestBody.description: Response with the modified data for the SIM that was selected.

schema.title: SIM Update Values

label.description: Label of the SIM set by the customer in the 1NCE Portal.

imei_lock.description: Flag that indicates if SIM is locked to the current device IMEI.

status.description: Status of the SIM. A SIM can be enabled (active) or disabled (deactivated).

schema.description: Information about a SIM card based on a SIM update procedure.

get.description: Query the current status of a specific SIM card.

parameters.name: iccid
parameters.description: The ICCID of the SIM to be queried.

schema.title: Connectivity

status.description: The current connectivity status of a SIM.

location.title: Location

imsi.description: IMSI of the SIM that triggered the event.

last_updated.description: Timestamp from the last location update.

last_updated_gprs.description: Timestamp from the last GPRS location update.

sgsn_number.description: Serving GPRS Support Node (SGSN) identifier for the SGSN where the SIM is attached.

sgsn_number_np.description: Serving GPRS Support Node (SGSN) Number NP.

operator_id.description: Identifier for the current operator the SIM is connected to.

sgsn_ip_address.description: IP address of the used Serving GPRS Support Node (SGSN).

id.description: Identifier for the operator.

name.description: String name of the operator where the SIM is currently attached to.

country.title: Country

id.description: Identifier of the country.

name.description: String name of the country of the operator where the SIM is currently attached.

country.description: Information about the country of the mobile operator.

name.description: String name of the country where the SIM device is currently located.

mcc.description: Mobile Country Code (MCC) of the SIM device location country.

latitude.description: Reference latitude of the location country.

longitude.description: Reference longitude of the location country.

location.description: Location information of the SIM device.

pdp_context.title: PDP Context

pdp_context_id.description: ID of the current PDP Context.

endpoint_id.description: ID of the used SIM endpoint.

tariff_profile_id.description: ID of the used tariff profile.

organisation_id.description: ID of the internal organisation reference.

imsi.description: IMSI of the specific SIM.

teid_data_plane.description: Tunnel ID for the current PDP Context user plane.

teid_control_plane.description: Tunnel ID for the current PDP Context control plane.

gtp_version.description: Version of the used GPRS Tunneling Protocol (GTP).

nsapi.description: ID of the used Network Service Access Point Identifier (NSAPI).

sgsn_control_plane_ip_address.description: IP address of the Serving GPRS Support Node (SGSN) for the control plane.

sgsn_data_plane_ip_address.description: IP address of the Serving GPRS Support Node (SGSN) for the user data plane.

ggsn_control_plane_ip_address.description: IP address of the Gateway GPRS Support Node (GGSN) for the control plane.

ggsn_data_plane_ip_address.description: IP address of the Gateway GPRS Support Node (GGSN) for the user data plane.

created.description: Timestamp when the PDP Context was created.

operator_id.description: ID of the used SIM endpoint.

lac.description: Location paramter of the PDP Context.

ue_ip_address.description: IP address of the device using the SIM.

imeisv.description: IMEISV of the device with the SIM.

duration.description: Current duration of the PDP Context.

rat_type.title: Radio Access Technolog (RAT) Type

description.description: String description of the used RAT.

rat_type.description: Describes the Radio Access Technology used in the PDP Context.

pdp_context.description: Information about the current PDP Context of the SIM.

post.description: Trigger a SIM transfer workflow - if possible - for moving SIMs from one customer to another.

schema.title: Sim Transfer Request

target_organisation.description: The organisation id to transfer the SIMs TO. Required if transferring to a suborganisation.

iccid_ranges.description: ICCID range of SIMs included or affected by this transfer.

from.description: The first ICCID of the given range of SIMs.

to.description: The last ICCID of the range of the given SIMs.

iccids.description: Individual ICCIDs of SIMs included or affected by this transfer.

items.description: List of ICCIDs of individual SIMs.

schema.description: Request data for transferring SIMs from one customer account to another.

get.description: Retrieve connectivity information and cell tower of a device with a given SIM. The API call returns valid information when the 1NCE SIM is attached to a 2G/3G network only.

parameters.name: iccid
parameters.description: The iccid of the SIM in question.

parameters.name: subscriber
parameters.description: Flag indicating if the subscriber information should be retrieved. Default value is true.

parameters.name: ussd
parameters.description: Flag for retrieving the USSD connectivity info. Default value is false.

schema.title: Connectivity Info

ussd_info.title: Ussd Information

success.description: Boolean flag indicating the success of the USSD request.

error.description: Optional information if some error occurred.

ussd_info.description: Optional ussd information, only set if the parameter 'ussd' is set to true.

subscriber_info.title: Subscriber Information

current_location_retrieved.description: Boolean flag indicating if the retrieved location is current.

age_of_location.description: Age of the location information in minutes.

cell_global_id.title: Cell Global IDs
cell_global_id.description: Mobile network parameter used to identify the cell tower of a SIM device.

subscriber_info.description: The optional subscriber info returned when the 'subscriber' parameter is true and contains information about the current SIM device location based on the mobile network.

request_timestamp.description: Time in UTC the request was received.

reply_timestamp.description: Time in UTC the response was sent.

schema.description: Contains connectivity and cell tower information for a given SIM request.

schema.title: Connectivity Info

ussd_info.title: Ussd Information

success.description: Boolean flag indicating the success of the USSD request.

error.description: Optional information if some error occurred.

ussd_info.description: Optional ussd information, only set if the parameter 'ussd' is set to true.

subscriber_info.title: Subscriber Information

current_location_retrieved.description: Boolean flag indicating if the retrieved location is current.

age_of_location.description: Age of the location information in minutes.

cell_global_id.title: Cell Global IDs
cell_global_id.description: Mobile network parameter used to identify the cell tower of a SIM device.

subscriber_info.description: The optional subscriber info returned when the 'subscriber' parameter is true and contains information about the current SIM device location based on the mobile network.

request_timestamp.description: Time in UTC the request was received.

reply_timestamp.description: Time in UTC the response was sent.

schema.description: Contains connectivity and cell tower information for a given SIM request.

post.description: Trigger a connectivity reset for a given SIM. The actual reset will be done asynchronously. A positive-response only means that the connectivity-reset has been successfully placed into the queue.

parameters.name: iccid
parameters.description: The ICCID of the SIM to be reset.

get.description: Get diagnostic/event information for a SIM card.

parameters.name: iccid
parameters.description: The ICCID of the SIM to be queried.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Number index of the requested SIM event page. Use this parameter to iterate through all SIMs on the different pages. The total amount of pages is listed in the response header.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of events per page, maximum allowed value is 1000.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort values based on keys that are listed as a comma seperated list, prepend "-" for descending order.

items.title: SIM Event

event_type.description: A text description of the event type.
event_type.example: Status of SIM changed from 'Issued' to 'Activated'

iccid.description: ICCID of the SIM that triggered the event.

imei.description: IMEI of the device that triggered the event.

imsi.description: IMSI of the SIM that triggered the event.

country.description: Mobile operator country where the event device is currently located.

operator.description: Operator name of the network the device is currently attached to.

mcc.description: Mobile Country Code (MCC) of the operator network.

mnc.description: Mobile Network Code (MNC) of the network the device is currently attached to.

alert.description: Boolean flag determining if this event is treated as an alert.

event_severity.description: Textual representation of the severity of the event.

items.description: Information about a Event. Besides the timestamp and the event_type all other values are optional and might not be included in the actual responses.

items.title: SIM Event

event_type.description: A text description of the event type.
event_type.example: Status of SIM changed from 'Issued' to 'Activated'

iccid.description: ICCID of the SIM that triggered the event.

imei.description: IMEI of the device that triggered the event.

imsi.description: IMSI of the SIM that triggered the event.

country.description: Mobile operator country where the event device is currently located.

operator.description: Operator name of the network the device is currently attached to.

mcc.description: Mobile Country Code (MCC) of the operator network.

mnc.description: Mobile Network Code (MNC) of the network the device is currently attached to.

alert.description: Boolean flag determining if this event is treated as an alert.

event_severity.description: Textual representation of the severity of the event.

items.description: Information about a Event. Besides the timestamp and the event_type all other values are optional and might not be included in the actual responses.

get.description: Query the SIM data and SMS usage over a given period of time. The output is limited to the last 6 months.

parameters.name: iccid
parameters.description: The ICCID of the SIM to be queried.

parameters.name: start_dt
parameters.description: Start date used for the query, format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: end_dt
parameters.description: End date used for the usage query, format: YYYY-MM-DD

schema.title: Usage Record

stats.description: List of queried usage statistics for the given SIM.

items.title: Daily Usage Record

data.title: Data Usage Record

cost.description: The cost shown here match 1:1 the used SMS. There is no real cost value behind this number.

id.description: Id of the currency.

traffic_type.title: Traffic Type Data

description.description: Defines the type of traffic listed.

id.description: ID of the traffic type.

unit.description: Lists the unit used for the traffic type.

traffic_type.description: Details about the data traffic type.

volume.description: The summed RX and TX data volume in MB.

volume_rx.description: The used RX (downstream, received by SIM) data volume in MB.

volume_tx.description: The used TX (upstream, send by SIM) data volume in MB.

data.description: A usage record for the data used by a SIM.

date.description: Date of the shown usage record.

sms.title: SMS Usage Record

cost.description: The cost shown here match 1:1 the used SMS. There is no real cost value behind this number.

id.description: Id of the currency.

traffic_type.title: Traffic Type SMS

description.description: Defines the type of traffic listed.

id.description: ID of the traffic type.

unit.description: Lists the unit used for the traffic type.

traffic_type.description: Details about the SMS traffic type.

volume.description: The summed MO- and MT-SMS messages count.

sms.description: A usage record for the SMS used by a SIM.

items.description: A daily usage record with summarized data about the SMS and data usage.

schema.description: Information about SIM data and SMS usage.

schema.title: Usage Record

stats.description: List of queried usage statistics for the given SIM.

cost.description: The cost shown here match 1:1 the used SMS. There is no real cost value behind this number.

id.description: Id of the currency.

traffic_type.title: Traffic Type SMS

description.description: Defines the type of traffic listed.

id.description: ID of the traffic type.

unit.description: Lists the unit used for the traffic type.

schema.description: Information about SIM data and SMS usage.

get.description: Get the current data quota of a particular SIM.

parameters.name: iccid
parameters.description: The ICCID of the SIM to be queried.

volume.description: Remaning volume of the selected SIM. Dependent on the query, the volume is either the number of SMS reamaining or the avaliable data volume in MB.

total_volume.description: The total data volume in MB or SMS number this SIM has available over its lifetime.

expiry_date.description: The date when this current quota will expire.

peak_throughput.description: The optional throughput in bit/s (only for data quotas).

last_volume_added.description: Amount of SMS or data volume which was last purchased for this SIM.

last_status_change_date.description: Timestamp of the last change to the quota.

threshold_percentage.description: Threshold in percentage for which a volume notification will be send.

volume.description: Remaning volume of the selected SIM. Dependent on the query, the volume is either the number of SMS reamaining or the avaliable data volume in MB.

total_volume.description: The total data volume in MB or SMS number this SIM has available over its lifetime.

expiry_date.description: The date when this current quota will expire.

peak_throughput.description: The optional throughput in bit/s (only for data quotas).

last_volume_added.description: Amount of SMS or data volume which was last purchased for this SIM.

last_status_change_date.description: Timestamp of the last change to the quota.

threshold_percentage.description: Threshold in percentage for which a volume notification will be send.

get.description: Get a list of SMS sent and received by a specific SIM card.

parameters.name: iccid
parameters.description: The ICCID of the SIM to be queried.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Number index of the requested SIM SMS page. Use this parameter to iterate through all SIMs on the different pages. The total amount of pages is listed in the response header.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of SMS messages per page, maximum allowed value is 100.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Keys by which the SMS messages should be sorted, listed as comma sperated values.

items.title: SMS Data Object

id.description: ID of the SMS Data Object.

submit_date.description: The date and time on which this SMS was submitted.

delivery_date.description: The date and time on which this SMS was delivered.

expiry_date.description: The date and time on which this SMS will expire.

retry_date.description: The date and time on which the delivery was retried.

last_delivery_attempt.description: The date and time on which the last delivery was attempted.

source_address.description: The source address of the SMS message.

msc.description: MSC involved in processing the SMS message.

post.description: Create and send a MT-SMS towards a device with a 1NCE SIM.

requestBody.description: The MT-SMS message that should be sent to SIM.

schema.title: SMS Message Object

source_address.description: The source address of the SMS. This value can be set to any number as it is not used by the 1NCE network.

payload.description: The content body of the SMS message.

udh.description: The optinal User Data Header (UDH) encoded has hex-String can be used to concatenate SMS messages.

dcs.description: The optional Data Coding Scheme (DCS) can be used for setting the message body format to HEX String or normal Text Mode.

id.description:
Numerical identifier for the type of source address of an SMS.
  • 145 - International
  • 161 - National
  • 208 - Alphanumeric

expiry_date.description: Expiry Date of the sent SMS in ISO8601 format.

post.description: Top up the data/SMS volume of one specific SIM.

parameters.name: iccid
parameters.description: The ICCID of the SIM to be topped up.

parameters.name: payment_method
parameters.description: Optional payment method selection between creditcard, banktransfer, monthlyinvoice or boleto. If the parameter is left empty or is invalid, banktransfer is used as default for the top up order process.

Location.description: The path to the newly created order.

value.message: Payment method used is not valid.

message.example: Payment method used is not valid.

403.description: SIM does not belong to user.

post.description: Top up the data/SMS volume of a list of SIM.

parameters.name: payment_method
parameters.description: Optional payment method selection between creditcard, banktransfer, monthlyinvoice or boleto. If the parameter is left empty or is invalid, banktransfer is used as default for the top up order process.

requestBody.description: A list of ICCIDs of SIMs where a Top Up should be executed.

Location.description: The path to the newly created order.

value.message: Payment method used is not valid.

message.example: Payment method used is not valid.

403.description: SIM does not belong to user.

post.description: Trigger an auto top up configuration update for the given SIMs.

requestBody.description: Auto top up request with ICCIDs of SIMs where the auto top up configuration should be changed.

schema.title: Auto Top Up Request

enabled.description: Boolean indicating wheather auto top up should be enabled or disabled for the given ICCIDs/SIMs.

iccids.description: A list of ICCIDs of SIMs where the auto top up configuration should be changed.

schema.description: Request with a flag for enabeling and disabeling auto top up for the listed ICCIDs.

get.description: Get currently configured self-set monthly limits (Data, MT-SMS, MO-SMS) for all SIMs.

data.title: Current Data Limit

id.description: Identifer for the currently configured limit.

unit.description: Unit of the set limit.

data.description: Currently self-set gloabl data volume limit.

post.description: Configure self-set monthly limits for all SIMs (Data, MT-SMS, MO-SMS).

schema.title: Set Limits Request

dataLimitId.description: Data Limit ID (from /sims/data/limits list) to be set for the self-set data limit.

smsMtLimitId.description: SMS MT Limit ID (from /sims/smsMT/limits list) to be set for self-set MT-SMS limit.

smsMoLimitId.description: SMS MO Limit ID (from /sims/smsMO/limits list) to be set for self-set MO-SMS limit.

schema.description: Configure the self-set limits (data, MT-SMS, MO-SMS) of all SIMs. Use /sims/{service}/limits to get a list of IDs for setting the limits.

get.description: Get a list of slectable limits for a given service.

parameters.name: service
parameters.description: The service name (data, smsMO, smsMT) for which to list the avaliable limit options.

data.title: Current Data Limit

id.description: Identifer for the currently configured limit.

unit.description: Unit of the set limit.

data.description: Currently self-set gloabl data volume limit.

smsMt.title: Current SMS Limit

unit.description: Unit of the set limit.

id.description: Identifer for the currently configured limit.

unit.description: Unit of the set limit.

smsMo.description: Currently self-set gloabl SMS limit for the given service (MT-SMS, MO-SMS).

post.description: Trigger the SIM extension for one or more SIM cards to extend their activation period and renew their quota (data and SMS). An invoice is automatically triggered depending on the chosen payment method.

parameters.name: payment_method
parameters.description: Optional payment method selection between creditcard, banktransfer or boleto. If the parameter is left empty or is invalid, banktransfer is used as default for the SIM extension process. To use creditcard please save your credit card details in the customer portal via "account".

requestBody.description: The body shall include a list of atleast one ICCIDs and optionally a product id.

schema.title: SIM Extension Request

iccids.description: A list of ICCIDs of SIMs which should be extended.

productId.description: Optional product id (see /v1/products) for changing the product during the process of the SIM extension. If left out, the current SIM product will be used for extension.

schema.description: Request for extending the lifetime of SIMs product.

SIMExtensionRequest.title: SIM Extension Request

iccids.description: A list of ICCIDs of SIMs which should be extended.

productId.description: Optional product id (see /v1/products) for changing the product during the process of the SIM extension. If left out, the current SIM product will be used for extension.

SIMExtensionRequest.description: Request for extending the lifetime of SIMs product.

AutoTopupRequest.title: Auto Top Up Request

enabled.description: Boolean indicating wheather auto top up should be enabled or disabled for the given ICCIDs/SIMs.

iccids.description: A list of ICCIDs of SIMs where the auto top up configuration should be changed.

AutoTopupRequest.description: Request with a flag for enabeling and disabeling auto top up for the listed ICCIDs.

age_of_location.description: Age of the location information in minutes.

mnc.description: Mobile Network Code (MNC) of the network the device is currently attached to.

alert.description: Boolean flag determining if this event is treated as an alert.

event_severity.description: Textual representation of the severity of the event.

items.description: Information about a Event. Besides the timestamp and the event_type all other values are optional and might not be included in the actual responses.

from.description: The first ICCID of the given range of SIMs.

to.description: The last ICCID of the range of the given SIMs.

volume.description: Remaning volume of the selected SIM. Dependent on the query, the volume is either the number of SMS reamaining or the avaliable data volume in MB.

total_volume.description: The total data volume in MB or SMS number this SIM has available over its lifetime.

expiry_date.description: The date when this current quota will expire.

peak_throughput.description: The optional throughput in bit/s (only for data quotas).

last_volume_added.description: Amount of SMS or data volume which was last purchased for this SIM.

last_status_change_date.description: Timestamp of the last change to the quota.

threshold_percentage.description: Threshold in percentage for which a volume notification will be send.

event_type.description: A text description of the event type.

iccid.description: ICCID of the SIM that triggered the event.

imei.description: IMEI of the device that triggered the event.

imsi.description: IMSI of the SIM that triggered the event.

country.description: Mobile operator country where the event device is currently located.

operator.description: Operator name of the network the device is currently attached to.

mcc.description: Mobile Country Code (MCC) of the operator network.

mnc.description: Mobile Network Code (MNC) of the network the device is currently attached to.

alert.description: Boolean flag determining if this event is treated as an alert.

event_severity.description: Textual representation of the severity of the event.

SIM_Event.description: Information about a Event. Besides the timestamp and the event_type all other values are optional and might not be included in the actual responses.

SIM_card.title: SIM Card

iccid_with_luhn.description: ICCID identifier of the SIM with Luhn check number.

imsi.description: First IMSI of the SIM, used for normal 1NCE network.

imsi_2.description: Second IMSI of the SIM, used for China+ network.

current_imsi.description: Currently active IMSI, dependent on the region where the SIM is used.

imei.description: IMEI of the device in which the SIM is inserted.

imei_lock.description: Indicates if SIM is locked to the current device IMEI.

status.description: The current status of the SIM card.

activation_date.description: The date when the SIM card was activated.

ip_address.description: The fixed IP address of the SIM card.

current_quota.description: The overall set data quota for the SIM in MB.

quota_status.title: Quota Status

id.description:
Numeric indicator for the threshold levels:
  • 0: more than 20%
  • 1: less than 20%
  • 2: 0% remaining

description.description: Text description of the quota status.

threshold_reached_date.description: Date on which the threshold less than 20% of the quota avaliable was reached.

quota_exceeded_date.description: Date on which 100% of the avaliable quota was exceeded.

quota_status.description: Indicates whether more than 20%, less than 20% or 0% of the current quota SMS or data are still available.

current_quota_SMS.description: Current SMS Quota for the SIM.

quota_status_SMS.title: Quota Status

id.description:
Numeric indicator for the threshold levels:
  • 0: more than 20%
  • 1: less than 20%
  • 2: 0% remaining

description.description: Text description of the quota status.

threshold_reached_date.description: Date on which the threshold less than 20% of the quota avaliable was reached.

quota_exceeded_date.description: Date on which 100% of the avaliable quota was exceeded.

quota_status_SMS.description: Indicates whether more than 20%, less than 20% or 0% of the current quota SMS or data are still available.

label.description: Label set by the customer in the 1NCE Portal for the SIM.

SIM_card.description: Detailed information about a SIM card.

SMSMessage.title: SMS Message Object

source_address.description: The source address of the SMS. This value can be set to any number as it is not used by the 1NCE network.

payload.description: The content body of the SMS message.

udh.description: The optinal User Data Header (UDH) encoded has hex-String can be used to concatenate SMS messages.

dcs.description: The optional Data Coding Scheme (DCS) can be used for setting the message body format to HEX String or normal Text Mode.

id.description:
Numerical identifier for the type of source address of an SMS.
  • 145 - International
  • 161 - National
  • 208 - Alphanumeric

expiry_date.description: Expiry Date of the sent SMS in ISO8601 format.

SMSMessage.description: SMS message object used to describe a SMS message.

SMS-Data.title: SMS Data Object

id.description: ID of the SMS Data Object.

submit_date.description: The date and time on which this SMS was submitted.

delivery_date.description: The date and time on which this SMS was delivered.

expiry_date.description: The date and time on which this SMS will expire.

retry_date.description: The date and time on which the delivery was retried.

last_delivery_attempt.description: The date and time on which the last delivery was attempted.

source_address.description: The source address of the SMS message.

iccid.description: The ICCID of the SIM involved in the SMS message.

msisdn.description: MSISDN of the SIM involved in the SMS message.

imsi.description: IMSI of the SIM involved in the SMS message.

msc.description: MSC involved in processing the SMS message.

dcs.description: The Data Coding Scheme (DCS) of the SMS.

udh.description: User Data Header encoded has hex-String.

payload.description: The content body of the SMS message.

id.description: Numerical status identifier for a SMS message.

description.description: Text description of the message status.

sms_type.title: Type definition for MT-SMS and MO-SMS.

id.description: Numerical identifier for the type of SMS message.

description.description: Type description of the SMS message.

id.description:
Numerical identifier for the type of source address of an SMS.
  • 145 - International
  • 161 - National
  • 208 - Alphanumeric

SMS-Data.description: The SMS data object contains all information about a SMS message.

SetLimitsRequest.title: Set Limits Request

dataLimitId.description: Data Limit ID (from /sims/data/limits list) to be set for the self-set data limit.

smsMtLimitId.description: SMS MT Limit ID (from /sims/smsMT/limits list) to be set for self-set MT-SMS limit.

smsMoLimitId.description: SMS MO Limit ID (from /sims/smsMO/limits list) to be set for self-set MO-SMS limit.

SetLimitsRequest.description: Configure the self-set limits (data, MT-SMS, MO-SMS) of all SIMs. Use /sims/{service}/limits to get a list of IDs for setting the limits.

SimTransfer.title: Sim Transfer Request

target_organisation.description: The organisation id to transfer the SIMs TO. Required if transferring to a suborganisation.

iccid_ranges.description: ICCID range of SIMs included or affected by this transfer.

from.description: The first ICCID of the given range of SIMs.

to.description: The last ICCID of the range of the given SIMs.

iccids.description: Individual ICCIDs of SIMs included or affected by this transfer.

items.description: List of ICCIDs of individual SIMs.

SimTransfer.description: Request data for transferring SIMs from one customer account to another.

SmsUsage.title: SMS Usage Record

cost.description: The cost shown here match 1:1 the used SMS. There is no real cost value behind this number.

id.description: Id of the currency.

traffic_type.title: Traffic Type SMS

description.description: Defines the type of traffic listed.

id.description: ID of the traffic type.

unit.description: Lists the unit used for the traffic type.

traffic_type.description: Details about the SMS traffic type.

volume.description: The summed MO- and MT-SMS messages count.

SmsUsage.description: A usage record for the SMS used by a SIM.

id.description: Numerical status identifier for a SMS message.

description.description: Text description of the message status.

SubscriberInfo.title: Subscriber Information

current_location_retrieved.description: Boolean flag indicating if the retrieved location is current.

age_of_location.description: Age of the location information in minutes.

cell_global_id.title: Cell Global IDs
cell_global_id.description: Mobile network parameter used to identify the cell tower of a SIM device.

SubscriberInfo.description: The optional subscriber info returned when the 'subscriber' parameter is true and contains information about the current SIM device location based on the mobile network.

success.description: Boolean flag indicating the success of the USSD request.

Values_for_a_SIM_update.title: SIM Update Values

label.description: Label of the SIM set by the customer in the 1NCE Portal.

imei_lock.description: Flag that indicates if SIM is locked to the current device IMEI.

status.description: Status of the SIM. A SIM can be enabled (active) or disabled (deactivated).

Values_for_a_SIM_update.description: Information about a SIM card based on a SIM update procedure.

BearerAuthentication.description: Bearer Authentication Token used to gain access to the 1NCE API. Please refer to the Open Authorization (/oauth/token) request for obtaining a Bearer Token.
